Settings

Colors Type-settings

In order that these .scss are loaded as imports:

  • - functions.scss math things
  • - type.scss see button above
  • - colors.scss see button above
  • - settings.scss setting line-height, base font-size, turning padding and margin trumps on and off
  • - global.scss global variables
  • - breakpoints.scss all breakpoints
  • - z-index.scss z-index when things get complicated
